DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 50 year ( include ) . Subjects ' weight within normal range accord normal value Body Mass Index ( 1 8.5 24.9 kg/m2 ) minimum 50 kg weight . Subjects clinically acceptable normal health determine personal medical history , clinical examination laboratory examination within clinically acceptable reference range . Subjects clinically acceptable 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) . Subjects clinically acceptable chest XRay ( PIA view ) . Subjects negative urine screen drug abuse ( include amphetamine , barbiturate , benzodiazepine , marijuana , cocaine , morphine ) . Subjects negative alcohol breath test . Subjects willing adhere protocol requirement provide write informed consent . The subject exclude study , meet follow criterion : Hypersensitivity Mycophenolate Mofetil relate drug . History presence significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunological , dermatological , neurological psychiatric disease disorder . History presence significant alcoholism drug abuse past one year . History presence significant smoking ( 10 cigarette day consumption tobacco product ) . History presence asthma , urticaria significant allergic reaction . History presence significant gastric and/or duodenal ulceration . History presence glaucoma , prostatic hypertrophy obstruction bladder neck , cardiospasm myasthenia gravis . History presence significant thyroid disease , adrenal dysfunction , organic intracranial lesion pituitary tumor . History presence cancer . Difficulty donate blood . Difficulty swallow solid like tablet capsule . Use prescribed medication OTC medicinal product last two week prior initiation study . Major illness 3 month screen . Participation drug research study within past 3 month . Donation blood past 3 month screen . Positive screen test one : HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C. History presence significant easy bruise bleeding . History presence significant recent trauma .
